Title: No-Bake Nut Cookies

Ingredients: ["1 c. firmly packed brown sugar", "1/2 c. evaporated milk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. broken nuts (pecans)", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3 1/2 c. bite size shredded rice biscuits"]
